title: Table Row Active
description: The active class is applied to the navigation element the user is currently viewing. In the case of your code, the user is viewing the profile. It will serve as a guide or reminder to where in the website the visitor is in. That is why the active class is applied, which comes handy when viewing a website with many navigation links.

title: Navbar Link Active
description: The active class is applied to the navigation element the user is currently viewing. In the case of your code, the user is viewing the profile. It will serve as a guide or reminder to where in the website the visitor is in. That is why the active class is applied, which comes handy when viewing a website with many navigation links.

title: List Group Item Active
description: Adds a blue background color to the active list item in a list group

title: Button Active
description: Adds a blue background color to simulate a "pressed" button

title: Progress Bar active
description: Animates a striped progress bar

title: Dropdown link active
description: Adds a blue background color to the active dropdown item in a dropdown

title: Pagination Link active
description: Adds a blue background color to the active pagination link (to highlight the current page)

title: Affix
description: The affix plugin toggles position: fixed; on and off, emulating the effect found with position: sticky;. The sub navigation on the right is a live demo of the affix plugin.

title: Alert
description: Provide contextual feedback messages for typical user actions with the handful of available and flexible alert messages. Alerts are available for any length of text, as well as an optional dismiss button.

title: Alert Danger
description: alert-danger class is red alert box Indicates a dangerous or potentially negative action. Add the class .alert-danger to the .alert base class to create error or danger alerts.

title: Alert Dismissable
description: Similar to a well it is a box with a border and padding. The .alert class adds the padding and margin. Defaults as red background color.

title: Alert Info
description: Similar to a well it is a box with a border and padding. The .alert class adds the padding and margin. Defaults as blue background color.

title: Alert Link
description: When you add links inside alert this class matches the font color to the parent alert class.

title: Alert Success
description: Similar to a well it is a box with a border and padding. The .alert class adds the padding and margin. Defaults as green background color.

title: Alert Warning
description: Similar to a well it is a box with a border and padding. The .alert class adds the padding and margin. Defaults as yellow background color.

title: Avatar
description: initial avatar class. This class includes all the features like avatar font size, alignment. The default size of this avatar is 32px

title: Avatar 16px
description: Avatar class for 16 px. Commonly used to display number of users  invoved in an activity

title: Avatar 24px
description: Avatar class of 24px. This size is  used to display subscriptions in navigaton or active users

title: Avatar 32px
description: Standard Avatar size for navbar or navmenu

title: Avatar 48px
description: Avatar class for 48 px. Best used in media object and list

title: Avatar 64px
description: Avatar class for 64 px. Can be used in media object or profile page

title: Avatar 96px
description: An alternate avatar size for navbar dropdown (gmail) for almost 100px

title: Avatar 128px
description: standard avatar size for profile page

title: Border
description: .b is border class, Border option provides the ability to sectionize a content and display in better way. Here .b provides border for all sides.

title: No Border
description: .b-0 is no border class, it does not provide a border, the class .b-0 will remove all the borders.

title: Border Top
description: .bt is a border class, which only provides border on top. bt stands for border top.

title: No Border Top
description: .bt-0 in no border class, it removes top border.

title: Border Right
description: .br class will give only right side border.

title: No Border Right
description: .br-0 class will remove only right side border

title: Border Bottom
description: .bb class will give only border only in bottom.

title: No Border Bottom
description: .bb-0 class will remove only bottom border.

title: Border Left
description: .bl class will work with left side border.

title: No Border Left
description: .bl-0 class will remove only left side border.

title: File input Button
description: Button for file input

title: Buttons Circle
description: .btn-circle class is used to make the buttons in circle shape.

title: Button Rounded
description: .btn-rounded class will convert the left and right edges in rounded shape.

title: Button Outline
description: .btn-outline class is used to make the buttons with outline.

title: Background Image Cover
description: This class includes the basic configuration required to set a background cover image on a selected element. You just need to define background-image CSS property along with this class.

title: Jumbotron Background Color
description: jumbotron Background color, .bg-jumbotron class is used to make the background color in light gray(jumbotron color).

title: Transparent Background Color
description: Make background transparent. Its a utility that can be used on list groups, tabs, panel heading.

title: Well Background color
description: .bg-well class is used to make the background color in well color.

title: White Background Color
description: .br-white will make the background color to white.

title: Badge
description: Used to show new or unread messages or items like the iOS red icon showing new messages or email.

title: Danger Background Color
description: Similar to the contextual text color classes, easily set the background of an element to any contextual class. Anchor components will darken on hover, just like the text classes. It adds a orange background color to an element.

title: Info Background Color
description: Similar to the contextual text color classes, easily set the background of an element to any contextual class. Anchor components will darken on hover, just like the text classes. It adds a light-blue background color to an element. Represents some information

title: Primary Background Color
description: Similar to the contextual text color classes, easily set the background of an element to any contextual class. Anchor components will darken on hover, just like the text classes. It adds a blue background color to an element.

title: Success Background Color
description: Similar to the contextual text color classes, easily set the background of an element to any contextual class. Anchor components will darken on hover, just like the text classes. It adds a green background color to an element. Which indicates success or a positive action.

title: Warning Background Color
description: Similar to the contextual text color classes, easily set the background of an element to any contextual class. Anchor components will darken on hover, just like the text classes. It adds a yellow background color to an element.

title: Breadcrumbs
description: A pagination. Indicates the current pages location within a navigational hierarchy

title: Common Button Class
description: This class creates a basic button (gray background and rounded corners) and also sets the spacing and size of the button.

title: Button Block
description: Creates a block level button that spans the entire width of the parent element.

title: Button Block for mobile devices
description: Creates a block level button that spans the entire width of the parent element in mobile screens.

title: Button Danger
description: It defaults to a red background button. Which Indicates danger or a negative action.

title: Button Default
description: It defaults to a white background button with dark gray border.

title: Button Group
description: Smushes multiple buttons together to make a pill shape. Each button is separated by a vertical line.

title: Justified Button Group
description: Make a group of buttons stretch at equal sizes to span the entire width of its parent. Also works with button dropdowns within the button group.

title: Large Button Group
description: Large button group (makes all buttons in a button group larger - increased font-size and padding)

title: Small Button Group
description: Small button group (makes all buttons in a button group smaller)

title: Extra Small Button Group
description: Extra small button group (makes all buttons in a button group extra small)

title: Vertical Button Group
description: Make a set of buttons appear vertically stacked rather than horizontally.

title: Info Button
description: Button for information on a topic like terms and conditions. Default color is light blue.

title: Link Button
description: Keeps the spacing set with the .btn class but removes the outer border. Makes a button look like a link (get button behavior)

title: Large Button
description: Fancy larger or smaller buttons? Add .btn-lg, .btn-sm, or .btn-xs for additional sizes.

title: Primary Button
description: Use for the primary action in a set. Which indicates with Blue color button.

title: Small Button
description: btn-sm is a fancy larger or smaller buttons? Add .btn-lg, .btn-sm, or .btn-xs for additional sizes.

title: Success Button
description: btn-success by defaults to a green background button with dark border. Which represents positive action.

title: Warning Button
description: By defaults btn-warning is to a yellow background button with dark border. Which represents warning or a negative action.

title: Extra Small Button
description: btn-xs is a fancy larger or smaller buttons? Add .btn-lg, .btn-sm, or .btn-xs for additional sizes. xs indicates Extra small button.

title: Image Caption
description: Adds a caption text inside a thumbnail, but could be used elsewhere.

title: Dropdown and Dropup Caret
description: Caret class creates a  arrow icon , Used in dropdown menus to show open and closed states.

title: Carousel Slider
description: Parent carousel class making it position relative, which creates a carousel (slideshow).

title: Carousel Caption
description: It creates a caption text for each slide item in the carousel.

title: Carousel Control
description: Container which is added to each next and previous anchors.

title: Carousel Indicators
description: Adds little dots/indicators at the bottom of each slide (which indicates how many slides there is in the carousel, and which slide the user are currently viewing)

title: Carousel Inner
description: It is a div wrapper that contains the carousel slide items.

title: Centered Block
description: Centers any element (Sets an element to display:block with margin-right:auto and margin-left:auto)

title: Input Checkbox Class
description: Form checkbox wrapper - Checkboxes are for selecting one or several options in a list, while radios are for selecting one option from many.

title: Inline Checkbox
description: Checkboxes are for selecting one or several options in a list, while radios are for selecting one option from many.

title: Float Clearfix
description: Used to clear floats by adding .cleafix to the parent element. It adds a pseudo element with clear:both property.

title: Close button
description: Use the generic close icon for dismissing content like modals and alerts.

title: Column Responsive Grid
description: Responsive grid (span 1-12 column). Extra small devices Phones (< 768px), Small devices Tablets (≥768px), Medium devices Desktops (≥992px), Large devices Desktops (≥1200px). Column values can be 1-12.

title: Column Offset Option
description: Move columns to the right. These classes increase the left margin of a column by * columns

title: Column Pull Option
description: Changes the order of the grid columns

title: Column Push Option
description: Changes the order of the grid columns

title: Element Collapsed
description: Indicates collapsible content - which can be hidden or shown on demand

title: Open Collapse Element
description: Show the collapsible content by default

title: Simple Container
description: Fixed width container with widths determined by screen sites. Equal margin on the left and right.

title: Fluid Container
description: A container that spans the full width of the screen

title: Flex Container
description: Uses display flex. This was created to adjust the footer link of panel as per text in grid system. Flex is not supported for Internet Explorer Browser

title: Login Container
description: Simple Login Container

title: 2 Column Login Container
description: 2 Column Login container for Descriptive text or social login

title: Medium Size Container
description: Container size of 970px

title: Small Size Container
description: Container size of 750px

title: Smooth Container
description: prevent container size jumping at media query breakpoints

title: Table Container
description: Displays grid as table, table-row and table-cell. It was specifically designed to center align-content. The limition of this grid is that you cannot to total xolumsize of more than 12. It is good to use with row split of full page height Content

title: Extra Small Size Container
description: Container size of 480px

title: Form Label
description: In forms this classes is added to form labels to allow the label to be used for form validation.

title: Table Danger row
description: Adds a red background to the table row (<tr> or table cell (<td>). Indicates a dangerous or potentially negative action

title: Button Disabled
description: Disables a button (adds opacity and a "no-parking-sign" icon on hover)

title: Dropdown Disabled
description: Disables a dropdown item (adds a grey text color and a "no-parking-sign" icon on hover)

title: Pagination Disabled
description: Disables a pagination link (cannot be clicked - adds a grey text color and a "no-parking-sign" icon on hover)

title: List Group Item Disabled
description: Disables a list item in a list group (cannot be clicked - adds a grey background color and a "no-parking-sign" icon on hover)

title: Dropdown Divider
description: Used to separate links in the dropdown menu with a thin horizontal border

title: Horizontal Description List
description: Lines up the terms <dt> and descriptions <dd> in <dl> elements side-by-side. Starts off like default <dl>s, but when the browser window expands, it will line up side-by-side

title: Dropdown Class
description: This class gives you the ability to add a dropdown to navbar, tabs, and pills so you can display a dropdown of additional navigation.

title: Dropdown Header
description: Used to add headers inside the dropdown menu

title: Dropdown Menu Class
description: Adds the default styles for the dropdown menu container

title: Right Align Dropdown
description: Right-aligns a dropdown menu

title: Dropdown Submenu
description: Create a submenu for a dropdown menu

title: Dropdown toggle link
description: Used on the button that should hide and show (toggle) the dropdown menu

title: Dropup
description: Indicates a dropup menu (upwards instead of downwards)

title: Responsive Embedded Content
description: Container for embedded content. Makes videos or slideshows scale properly on any device

title: Responsive Embedded 16 by 9 Resolution
description: Container for embedded content. Creates an 16:9 aspect ratio embedded content

title: Responsive Embedded 4 by 3 Resolution
description: Container for embedded content. Creates an 4:3 aspect ratio embedded content

title: Responsive Embedded Item
description: Used inside .embed-responsive. Scales the video nicely to the parent element

title: Fade Animation
description: Adds a fading effect when closing an alert box

title: Form Control
description: Used on input, textarea, and select elements to span the entire width of the page and make them responsive

title: Form Validation Feedback
description: A form validation class.

title: Form Static Content
description: Lets you add plain text to the right of a label. For example, Email label could have help text.

title: Form Group
description: Container for form input and label

title: Inline Form
description: Makes a <form> left-aligned with inline-block controls (This only applies to forms within viewports that are at least 768px wide)

title: Horizontal form elements
description: Aligns labels and groups of form controls in a horizontal layout

title: Justified Grid Gutter
description: Justifies the gutter width in left and right

title: No gutter in grid
description: Removes gutter from grid

title: Gutter width of 5px in grid
description: Applies 5 pixel gutter on grid

title: Gutter width of 10px in grid
description: Applies 10 pixel gutter on grid

title: Gutter width of 15px in grid
description: Applies 15 pixel gutter on grid

title: Gutter width of 20px in grid
description: Applies 20 pixel gutter on grid

title: Footer
description: Simple footer class

title: File Input
description: File Input Element wrapper

title: File Input Preview
description: Image preview of uploaded file

title: Fill
description: fill the image in an element using width and height of 100%

title: Full Height
description: makes element of 100% height

title: Responsive Font Size
description: Responsive font size utility

title: Right Sidebar width
description: Allows to place a fixed with responsive sidebar on the right side of the content

title: Glyphicon Font Class
description: Creates an icon. Bootstrap provides 260 free glyphicons from the Glyphicons Halflings set

title: Danger Form Validation
description: Adds a red color to the label and a red border to the input, as well as an error icon inside the input (used together with .has-feedback)

title: Input Feedback Icon
description: Adds feedback icons for inputs (checkmark, warning and error signs)

title: Success Form Validation
description: Adds a green color to the label and a green border to the input, as well as a checkmark icon inside the input (used together with .has-feedback)

title: Warning Form Validation
description: Adds a yellow/orange color to the label and a yellow/orange border to the input, as well as a checkmark icon inside the input (used together with .has-feedback)

title: Generate a Sticky footer
description: Allow Footer to be sticky at the bottom of page

title: Form Help Text
description: A block of help text that breaks onto a new line and may extend beyond one line.

title: Hidden
description: Forces an element to be hidden (display:none)

title: Responsive Hidden
description: Hides content depending on screen size

title: Hide
description: This class is the same as hidden but is deprecated so use .hidden instead

title: Headings
description: Apply heading styles to other elements. Make a paragraph look like an h1.

title: Hamburger Icon
description: Used in the navbar to create a hamburger menu (three horizontal bars)

title: Carousel Next
description: Unicode icon (arrow pointing right), used in carousels. This is often replaced with a glyphicon

title: Carousel Previous
description: Unicode icon (arrow pointing left), used in carousels. This is often replaced with a glyphicon

title: Circle Image
description: Shapes an image to a circle (not supported in IE8 and earlier)

title: Responsive image
description: Makes a image responsive. The image resizes with the width of screen. the maximum size of image is always the size resolution of image.

title: Rounded Image
description: It adds rounded corners to an image.

title: Image Thumbnail
description: Shapes an image to a thumbnail (borders)

title: Fade Animate class
description: Fades in tabs

title: Table Info
description: Adds a light-blue background to the table row (<tr> or table cell (<td>). Indicates a neutral informative change or action

title: Initialism
description: Displays the text inside an <abbr> element in a slightly smaller font size

title: Input Group
description: Container to enhance an input by adding an icon, text or a button in front or behind it as a "help text"

title: Large Input Group
description: input-group-lg class is used for large input group

title: Small Input Group
description: input-group-sm class is used for small input group

title: Input Group Addon
description: Together with the .input-group class, this class makes it possible to add an icon or help text next to the input field

title: Input Group Button
description: Together with the .input-group class, this class attaches a button next to an input. Often used as a search bar

title: Large Input
description: Set heights using classes like .input-lg, and set widths using grid column classes like .col-lg-*.

title: Small Input Group
description: Set heights using classes like .input-lg, and set widths using grid column classes like .col-lg-*.

title: Invisibile
description: Makes an element invisible (visibility:hidden). Note: Even though the element is invisible, it will take up space on the page

title: Carousel Item
description: Class added to each carousel item. May be text or images

title: Jumbotron
description: Creates a padded grey box with rounded corners that enlarges the font sizes of the text inside it. Creates a big box for calling extra attention to some special content or information

title: Label
description: Adds a grey rounded box to an element. Provides additional information about something (e.g. "New")

title: Danger Label
description: Change color of the label by adding label-danger class for  Red label.

title: Info Label
description: Change color of the label by adding label-info class for Light-blue label

title: Success Label
description: Change color of the label by adding  label-success class for Green label

title: Warning Label
description: Change color of the label by adding label-warning class for Yellow label

title: Lead Text
description: Increase the font size and line height of a paragraph. Good to use on the first paragraph of an article to improve readability.

title: Carousel Left Control
description: Used to identify the left carousel control

title: List Group
description: Creates a bordered list group for <li> elements

title: List Group Item
description: Added to each <li> element in the list group

title: List Group Item Heading
description: Creates a list group heading (used on other elements besides <li>)

title: List Group Item Text
description: Used for item text inside the list group (used on other elements besides <li>)

title: Danger List Group Item
description: Red background color for a list item in a list group

title: Info List Group Item
description: Light-blue background color for a list item in a list group

title: Success List Group Item
description: Green background color for a list item in a list group

title: Warning List Group Item
description: Yellow background color for a list item in a list group

title: Inline List
description: Places all list items on a single line (horizontal menu)

title: Unstyled List
description: Removes all default list-style (bullets, left margin, etc.) styling from a <ul> or <ol> list

title: Mark Text
description: Highlights text: Highlighted text

title: Media Object
description: For highlighting a run of text due to its relevance in another context, use the mark tag.

title: Media Class
description: Text that should appear next to a media object

title: Media Heading
description: Creates a heading inside the media object

title: Media List
description: Nested media lists would be good used as comments

title: Media object Left
description: Aligns media object to Left in comments or news feed

title: Media Object Right
description: Aligns media object to Right in comments or news feed

title: Media Object
description: Class added to a media component image.

title: Modal
description: Identifies the content as a modal and brings focus to it

title: Modal Body
description: The modal body content class : Header - Body - Footer

title: Modal Content
description: Styles the modal (border, background-color, etc). Inside this, add the modals header, body and footer, if needed

title: Modal Dialog
description: Sets the proper width and margin of the modal

title: Modal Footer
description: The footer of the modal (often contains an action button and a close button)

title: Modal Header
description: The header of the modal (often contains a title and a close button)

title: Large Modal
description: It makes a model wider or Large modal (wider than default)

title: Open Modal
description: Javascript adds this class to the body tag to prevent scrolling with the modal is open.

title: Small Modal
description: Makes the modal not as wide or Small modal (less width)

title: Modal Title
description: The title of the modal

title: Navbar Height Margin Top
description: Helper Class to adjust margin to of navmenu, body or wrapper as per navbar height while using a Fixed Navbar

title: Navbar Height Margin Bottom
description: Helper Class to adjust margin to of navmenu, body or wrapper as per navbar height while using a Bottom Fixed Navbar

title: Responsive Margin
description: Responsive margin at all side of element

title: Responsive Margin top
description: Responsive margin at top of element

title: Responsive Margin Right
description: Responsive margin at right of element

title: Responsive Margin Bottom
description: Responsive margin at bottom of element

title: Responsive Margin Left
description: Responsive margin at left of element

title: Tabs
description: Class added to enable Bootstrap tabs, simply we can say navigation menu.

title: Pills
description: Indicates a pill menu

title: Navbar Navigation List
description: Used on a <ul> container that contains the list items with links inside a navigation bar

title: Justified Navigation
description: Centers tabs/pills. Note that on screens smaller than 768px the items are stacked (content will remain centered)

title: Stacked Navigation
description: Vertically stack tabs or pills

title: Common Navbar Class
description: Creates a navigation header bar.

title: Brand Text or Logo Class of Navbar
description: Added to a link or a header element inside the navbar to represent a logo or a header

title: Navbar Button
description: Vertically aligns a button inside a navbar

title: Collapsable Navbar Menu
description: Collapses the navbar (hidden and replaced with a menu/hamburger icon on mobile phones and small tablets)

title: Default Navbar Theme Classs
description: Creates a default navigation bar (light-grey background color)

title: Bottom Fixed Navbar
description: Makes the navbar stay at the bottom of the screen (sticky/fixed)

title: Top Fixed Navbar
description: Makes the navbar stay at the top of the screen (sticky/fixed)

title: Navbar Form
description: Added to form elements inside the navbar to vertically center them (proper padding)

title: Navbar Header
description: Added to a container element that contains the link/element that represent a logo or a header

title: Inverse Navbar Theme
description: Creates a black navigation bar (instead of light-grey)

title: Left Align Navbar Menu
description: Aligns nav links, forms, buttons, or text, in the navbar to the left

title: Navbar Link
description: Styles an element to look like a link inside the navbar (anchors get proper padding and an underline on hover, while other elements like p or span gets a default hover effect - white color in an inversed navbar and a black color in a default navbar)

title: Navbar Navigation Menu
description: Used on a <ul> container that contains the list items with links inside a navigation bar

title: Right Align Navbar
description: Aligns nav links, forms, buttons, or text in the navbar to the right.

title: Top Static Navbar
description: Removes left, top and right borders (rounded corners) from the navbar (default navbar has a gray border and a 4px border-radius by default)

title: Navbar Text
description: Vertical align any elements inside the navbar that are not links (ensures proper padding)

title: Navbar Toggle Link
description: Styles the button that should open the navbar on small screens. Often used together with three .icon-bar classes to indicate a toggleable menu icon (hamburger/bars)

title: Justified Navigation for mobile screen
description: This class justified tabs and pill in small screen. Justified Tabs is common in apps and similar feature can be used this class

title: Common Navmenu Class
description: Creates a Vertical Navigation Menu of 240px

title: Left Fixed Navmenu
description: Creates a fixed Navigation Menu at left of page. a responsive padding or margin of 240px is required to body or wrapper

title: Right Fixed Navmenu
description: Creates a fixed Navigation Menu at Right of page. a responsive padding or margin of 240px is required to body or wrapper

title: No Underline
description: Removes under line for normal, hover and visited states

title: Navbar Slide Support Class
description: Allow Container and container fluid navbar to slide in mobile resolution

title: Static Navbar Content in Right
description: Allows to add non responsive navbar item in right.

title: Justified Navbar
description: Created a justified Navbar (like Apple Website). Navbar-brand is not required while using this class on .navbar-nav

title: Carousel Next
description: Used in the carousel control to identity the next control

title: Pager Next
description: Used to align pager buttons to the right side of the page (next button)

title: Offcanvas
description: Offcanvas helps navbar and Navmenu to slide in

title: Responsive Offcanvas
description: Allow Navmenu toggle at any breakpoint

title: Common Page Class
description: Common page class

title: Page Main
description: Class designed to support sidebar. It is recommended to use this class on <main> tag

title: Page Content
description: Place content of your page in this wrapper

title: Page Sidebar
description: Creates Sidebar of page of width 240px. This sidebar is of fixed width till small size screen.

title: Page Header
description: Adds a horizontal line under the heading (+ adds some extra space around the element)

title: Pager
description: class added to a ul which contains li with anchors. Good for previous and next buttons.

title: Pagination
description: Creates a pagination (Useful when you have a web site with lots of pages. Used on <ul> elements)

title: Large Pagination
description: Large pagination (each pagination link gets a font-size of 18px. Default is 14px)

title: Small Pagination
description: Small pagination (each pagination link gets a font-size of 12px. Default is 14px)

title: Common Panel Class
description: Change the color of the panel by adding the following: default, primary, info, warning, danger.

title: Panel Body
description: Panel body can contain text content and has padding of 15px in all sides. Class added to the panel body because there is also a panel heading.

title: Collapsable Panel
description: Collapsible panel (toggle between hiding and showing panel(s))

title: Danger Panel
description: We can change the color of the panel by adding the panel-danger class , Red color. Indicates danger

title: Info Panel
description: We can change the color of the panel by adding the panel-info class , Light-blue panel. Indicates information

title: Success Panel
description: We can change the color of the panel by adding the panel-success class , Green panel. Indicates success

title: Warning Panel
description: We can change the color of the panel by adding the panel-warning class , Yellow panel. Indicates warning

title: Panel Footer
description: Creates a panel footer (light background color)

title: Panel Group
description: Used to group many panels together. This removes the bottom margin below each panel

title: Panel Heading
description: Creates a panel header (light background color)

title: Panel Title
description: Used inside a .panel-heading to adjust the styling of the text (removes margins and adds a font-size of 16px)

title: Scrollable Pre tag
description: Makes a <pre> element scrollable (max-height of 350px and provide a y-axis scrollbar)

title: Carousel Previous
description: Used in carousels to indicate a "previous" link

title: Pager Previous
description: Used to align pager buttons to the left side of the page (previous button)

title: Common Progress Class
description: Container for progress bars, with % indication.

title: Progress bar
description: Creates a progress bar

title: Danger Progress Bar
description: Red progress bar. Indicates danger

title: Info Progress Bar
description: Light-blue progress bar. Indicates information

title: Striped Progress Bar
description: Creates a striped progress bar

title: Success Progress Bar
description: Green progress bar. Indicates success

title: Warning Progress Bar
description: Yellow progress bar. Indicates warning

title: Float Left
description: Float an element to the left, pulling an element to left.

title: Float Right
description: Float an element to the right, its pulling an element to right side.

title: Navbar Height Padding Top
description: Helper Class to adjust padding top of navmenu, body or wrapper as per navbar height while using a Fixed Navbar

title: Navbar Height padding Bottom
description: Helper Class to adjust padding bottom of navmenu, body or wrapper as per navbar height while using a Bottom Fixed Navbar

title: Responsive Padding
description: Responsive padding at all side of element

title: Responsive Padding Top
description: Responsive padding at top of element

title: Responsive Padding Right
description: Responsive padding at right of element

title: Responsive Padding Bottom
description: Responsive padding at bottom of element

title: Responsive Padding Left
description: Responsive padding at left of element

title: Carousel Right
description: Used to identify the right carousel control

title: Grid Row
description: Container for responsive columns

title: Flex Row
description: Converts a normal grid row to flex row

title: Border split or divider for grid
description: Divides grid columns by using borders to the right of column. THe borders are responsive and only work when column size is below 12

title: Separated List
description: Used for inline list. The separator is |

title: Show
description: Shows an element (display:block)

title: Small Text
description: Creates a lighter, secondary text in any heading

title: Screen Reader Only
description: Hides an element on all devices except for screen readers

title: Focusable Screen Reader Only
description: Hides an element on all devices except for screen readers

title: Table Success
description: Adds a green background color to a table row (<tr> or table cell (<td>). Indicates success or a positive action

title: Tab Content
description: Used together with .tab-pane to creates toggleable/dynamic tabs/pills

title: Tab Pane
description: Used together with .tab-content to creates toggleable/dynamic tabs/pills

title: Left Sided Tabs
description: Tabs on Left side of the Content

title: Right Sided Tabs
description: Tabs on Right side of the content

title: Table
description: Adds basic styling to a table (padding, bottom borders, etc)

title: Bordered Table
description: Adds borders on all sides of the table and cells

title: Condensed Table
description: Makes a table more compact by cutting cell padding in half

title: Striped Table
description: add zebra-striping to any table row within the <tbody>

title: Table with Row Hover
description: Creates a hoverable table (adds a grey background color on table rows on hover)

title: Responsive Table
description: Makes a table responsive (adds a horizontal scrollbar when needed)

title: Capitalize Text
description: Indicates capitalized text, this class will allow us to make the text in capital letters.

title: Center Align Text
description: It aligns our text to center, or Center-aligns text

title: Danger Color Text
description: text-danger class applys red color to text which Indicates danger.

title: Hide Text
description: Hides text (helps replace an elements text content with a background image)

title: Info Color Text
description: Light-blue text color. Indicates information

title: Justified Text
description: Indicates justified text

title: Left Align Text
description: Aligns the text to the left

title: Lowercase Text
description: Changes text to lowercase

title: Muted Color Text
description: text-muted class turns the text to Grey color.

title: Nowrap Text
description: Prevents the text from wrapping

title: Primary Color Text
description: text-primary class turns the text to blue color.

title: Right Align Text
description: Aligns text to the right

title: Success Color Text
description: Green text color. Indicates success

title: Uppercase Text
description: Makes text uppercase

title: Warning Color Text
description: Yellow/orange text color. Indicates warning

title: Responsive Text Center
description: Supports Center Text Alignment as per breakpoint

title: Responsive Text Left
description: Supports Left Text Alignment as per breakpoint

title: Responsive Text Right
description: Supports Right Text Alignment as per breakpoint

title: Thumbnail
description: Adds a border around an element (often images or videos) to make it look like a thumbnail

title: Vertical Middle
description: Utility class to vertical middle align a table-cell, inline block and inline element

title: Vertical Top
description: Utility class to vertical top align a table-cell, inline block and inline element

title: Vertical Bottom
description: Utility class to vertical bottom align a table-cell, inline block and inline element

title: Responsive Visibility Classes
description: Deprecated as of v3.2.0. Used to show and/or hide content by device. Note: Use .hidden-* instead

title: Print Visible
description: Displays the element (display:block) in print (pre)view

title: Print Visible Inline
description: Displays the element (display:inline) in print (pre)view

title: Print Visible Inline Block
description: Displays the element (display:inline-block) in print (pre)view

title: Hidden in Print
description: Hides the element (display:none) in print (pre)view

title: Table Warning Row
description: Adds a yellow background color to the table row (<tr> or table cell (<td>). Indicates a warning

title: Well
description: Wells are good for insetting some content. The default styling adds a border box and inner padding.

title: Large Well
description: Wells are good for insetting some content. The default styling adds a border box and inner padding. This class doubles the padding.

title: Small Well
description: Wells are good for insetting some content. The default styling adds a border box and inner padding. This class decreases the padding.

title: Blockquote
description: quoting blocks of content from another source within your document.
